data.text:
A special episode dedicated to Gao Xingjian, Chinese writer, painter, and playwright. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2000. In 2004, a team from the CCCB traveled to Paris and interviewed Gao Xingjian at his home. He told us about his childhood, his first contacts with literature and painting, his work process: narrate in freedom, the art of the moment, the zen spirit and his concept of beauty.

Related to The world of Gao, Soy CÃ¡mara online
